entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
